Author: subUrbanMire

Comment: Republicans are trying to put in a deregulatory act in a Budget Reconciliation bill. You can’t filibuster a Budget Reconciliation bill like you can other acts. This type of bill is supposed to only be for Tax/expenditure.   Democrats tried to put an increase in the minimum wage in that Budget bill when they controlled the house/Senate but the Senate Parliamentarian told them they couldn’t.  If Republicans get their way with this, it would mark another time Democrats handcuffed themselves while Republicans set the house on fire.
